sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Barcode from 'react-barcode'; import { QRCodeCanvas } from 'qrcode.react'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const EWayBill = ( ) => { const [billData, setBillData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const rawBillData = Cookies.get('userData'); if (rawBillData) { const parsedBillData = JSON.parse(rawBillData); setBillData(parsedBillData); // Set the billData state } }); const qrCodeValue = `eWay Bill No: ${billData.ewayBillNo || "N/A"}, Validity Time: ${billData.validity_time || "N/A"}, Generated Time: ${billData.generated_time || "N/A"}`; return (

E-Way Bill

1. E-WAY BILL Details

eWay Bill No:{" "} {billData.ewayBillNo || "N/A"}

Generated Date:{" "} {billData.generatedDate || "N/A"}

Generated By:{" "} {billData.generatedBy || "N/A"}

Valid Upto:{" "} {billData.validUpto || "N/A"}

Mode:{" "} {billData.transMode || "N/A"}

Approx Distance:{" "} {billData.transDistance || "N/A"}

Type:{" "} {billData.transactionTypeDesc || "N/A"}

Document Details:{" "} {billData.docType} - {billData.docNo} - {billData.docDate}

Transaction Type:{" "} {billData.transactionTypeDesc || "N/A"}

2. Address Details

From

GSTIN: {" "} {billData.fromGstin || "N/A"}

{billData.fromTrdName || "N/A"}


:: Dispatch From ::

{billData.fromAddr1},
{billData.fromAddr2}, {billData.fromPlace}, {billData.fromPincode}

To

GSTIN: {" "} {billData.toGstin || "N/A"}

{billData.toTrdName || "N/A"}


:: Shipped From ::

{billData.toAddr1},
{billData.toAddr2}, {billData.toPlace}, {billData.toPincode}

3. Goods Details

{billData.itemList.map((item, index) => ( ))}
HSN Product & Desc. Quantity Taxable Amount Tax Rate (C+S+I+Cess)
{item.hsnCode || "N/A"} {item.productName || "N/A"} & {item.productDesc || "N/A"} {item.quantity || "N/A"} {item.qtyUnit || "N/A"} {item.taxableAmount || "N/A"} {item.sgstRate || "N/A"} + {item.cgstRate || "N/A"} + {item.igstRate || "N/A"} + {item.cessRate || "N/A"}
Tot. Taxable Amt CGST Amt SGST Amt IGST Amt CESS Amt CESS Non.Advol Amt Other Amt Total Inv. Amount
{billData.totalValue || "N/A"}
{billData.cgstValue || "N/A"}
{billData.sgstValue || "N/A"}
{billData.igstValue || "N/A"}
{billData.cessValue || "N/A"}
{billData.cessNonAdvolValue || "N/A"}
{billData.otherValue || "N/A"}
{billData.totInvValue || "N/A"}

4. Transportation Details

Transporter ID & Name: {billData.transporterName || "N/A"}, {billData.transporterId || "N/A"}
Transporter Doc. No & Date: {billData.transDocNo || "N/A"}, {billData.transDocDate || "N/A"}

5. Vehicle Details

{billData.itemList.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Mode Vehicle / Trans Doc No & Dt. From Entered Date Entered By CEWB No. (if any) Multi Veh.Info (if any)
{billData.transMode || "Not Provided"} {billData.vehicleNo || "Not Provided"} &{" "} {billData.vehicleType || "Not Provided"} {billData.fromAddr1 || "Not Provided"}{" "} {billData.generatedDate || "Not Provided"} {billData.generatedBy || "Not Provided"} {"-" || "Not Provided"} {"-" || "Not Provided"}
Note*: If there is any discrepancy in information please try again after sometime.
); }; export default EWayBill;
